## Study Advice
Try to complete the problems on your own before going to class. Active problem-solving is essential for mastering industrial organisation concepts.
:::

## How to Use These Exercises

1. **Review the relevant lecture material** before attempting each problem set
2. **Attempt all problems** without looking at solutions
3. **Check your answers** against the solutions
4. **Identify gaps** in your understanding and revisit lecture notes
